resources.string: I have extensive experience in various organizations within the university that have helped me develop leadership and collaboration skills. During my studies, I have acquired technical skills in visual design, Internet of Things, database, and website and mobile application development. In addition, I also have creative skills in photography and videography, which is not only a hobby but also a source of income.

Hard Skills: Java, Kotlin, C, C++, Python, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ReactJS, MySQL, NoSQL.\n\nSoft Skills: Effective Communication, Teamwork, Time Management, Adaptability, Networking, Positive Attitude, Project Management, Digital Skills, Critical Thinking and Problem Solving.
